DiscordFile = ref object
  name*: string
  body*: string
A Discord file. It's a special type.   Source Edit 
AllowedMentions = ref object
  parse*: seq[string]          ## The values should be "roles", "users", "everyone"
  roles*: seq[string]
  users*: seq[string]
An object of allowed mentions   Source Edit
